metadata.dc:author: Gil Martínez, R
Herrera Justiniano, J M
Martínez-Parra, D
Castro Fernández, M
metadata.dc:description: We report a case of carcinosarcoma or pseudosarcoma of the esophagus, diagnosed through biopsy and endoscopic brush. We also describe several histogenetics hypothesis about this infrequent neoplasm and the difficulty of its diagnosis by means of endoscopy. We emphasize the endoscopic brush positivity and the description of its cytologic characteristics.
metadata.dc:title: Aspectos citomorfológicos del carcinosarcoma (seudosarcoma) esofágico.
[Cytomorphologic characteristics of esophageal carcinosarcoma (pseudosarcoma)].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
